description.p: A humanoid cursed with lycanthropy, capable of shifting between humanoid, wolf, and hybrid forms.
Werewolves appear as humans, wolves, or hybrids of both. Their senses and reflexes are enhanced.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.
Age. Werewolves mature like humans and can live up to 90 years.
Speed. Base walking speed 30 ft.; in wolf form speed 40 ft.
Keen Hearing and Smell. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
Shapechanger. You can use an action to shift between humanoid, wolf, and hybrid forms. Equipment does not transform automatically (DM discretion).
Lycanthropic Immunity. You are immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks that are not silvered. (Use with DM approval.)

Bite (Hybrid or Wolf Form Only). Melee Weapon Attack: Proficiency bonus to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + Strength modifier piercing damage. Target must succeed on a DC 8 + proficiency bonus + Constitution modifier Constitution save or risk contracting lycanthropy (DM's call).
Claws (Hybrid Form Only). Melee Weapon Attack: Proficiency bonus to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + Strength modifier slashing damage.
Multiattack (Hybrid Form Only). You can make two attacks: one with your bite and one with your claws.
You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
